    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCustomer()
      This method addCustomer prompts for Customer information which is sent to the UserRecords to be added.
      void addSupplier()
      This method addSupplier prompts for the supplier name and phone number and calls a method in UserRecords to add a Supplier.
      void deleteCustomer()
      This method deleteCustomer prompts for the Customer ID.
      protected void printMenu()
      Overrides printMenu
      void purchaseVehicle()
      This method purchaseVehicle collects vehicle, customer and employee information and then calls a method in Transactions.
      void respondToMsg()
      This method respondToMsg allows an Employee to respond to a Customer message.
      void run()
      Overrides run method.
      void searchInventory()
      This method searchInventory prompts for the vin then calls a method in VehicleInventory to search the inventory.
      void sellVehicle()
      This method sellVehicle collects vehicle, customer and employee information and then calls a method in Transactions.
      void updateCustomer()
      This method updateCustomer prompts for the customer ID.
      void updateVehicle()
      This method updateVehicle prompts for a VIN, if not found the method returns.

        public void addSupplier()

      • updateCustomer

        public void updateCustomer()
                    throws BadInputException
        This method updateCustomer prompts for the customer ID. If not found the method will return. If found a call is made to UserRecords to update a Customer.
        Throws:
        BadInputException

      • updateVehicle

        public void updateVehicle()
                   throws BadInputException
        This method updateVehicle prompts for a VIN, if not found the method returns. If found a call is made to VehicleInventory to update a vehicle.
        Throws:
        BadInputException

      • deleteCustomer

        public void deleteCustomer()
                    throws BadInputException
        This method deleteCustomer prompts for the Customer ID. A call is made to UserRecords to delete a Customer.
        Throws:
        BadInputException

      • searchInventory

        public void searchInventory()
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method searchInventory prompts for the vin then calls a method in VehicleInventory to search the inventory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
